reviews.comment: I had the opportunity of stumbling across Cocoon in Canggu. I have always had the urge to do a colonic and decided to go ahead with nurse Kathleen. Santi and Weby were so informative when I first walked in and gave me all the information. I was able to make the decision easier. I highly recommend nurse Kathleen for her gentle approach and guidance through what is an uncomfortable procedure. Santi and Weby make you feel like family.10/10 genuine kind service.

reviews.comment:
(Translated by Google) A beautiful clinic with very friendly staff. However, after having my lip fillers placed, I immediately experienced severe migration above my lip. At first, I thought it was the swelling. But after waiting a few weeks, I went back and indeed, there was migration. Because I was leaving Bali the next day, resolving the issue and re-inserting it wasn't an option. The manager said they would call me with a solution, but I never received a call again, no response, and now I have lip fillers above my lip. Don't get your lips done here!

(Original)
Mooie kliniek met erg vriendelijk personeel. Echter na het plaatsen van mijn lip fillers had ik direct last van enorme migratie boven mijn lip, eerst dacht ik zal wel de zwelling zijn. Maar na een paar weken wachten toch terug gegaan en inderdaad migratie. Omdat ik een dag erna Bali weer ging verlaten was oplossen en opnieuw plaatsen geen optie. De manager zou me bellen met een oplossing, ik ben nooit meer gebeld, krijg geen reactie meer en ik heb nu lipfillers boven mijn lip zitten, doe je lippen hier niet!

reviewReply.comment:
Dear Elin,

We are sorry to hear you are unhappy with your results.
Our medical records show that during consultation with our doctor, you previously had significant lip filler elsewhere. Our doctor advised that adding more volume could increase the risk of complications, including migration. Despite this professional recommendation, you insisted on additional filler. Our doctor administered a conservative 1ml, advising that this was a safe amount. One week later, You returned requesting more against medical advice, a further 0.5ml was administered at your insistence and we communicated to you for the rest/remaining of 0.5ml will be kept in our Pharmacy within 2 weeks and destroy afterward.  The doctor‚Äôs primary concern, which was communicated, was the risk of overfilling, which can lead to the issue you describe.

We regret that we were unable to resolve this for you before your departure from Bali. We take all concerns seriously, and our manager has attempted to contact you. We would like to continue this conversation to understand your desired outcome. Please WhatsApp us directly to ‚Ä™+62811388815‚Ä¨ so we can find a solution and our doctor can give you further¬†solution.

Best regards,
Cocoon Medical Spa Team
